sentences.en: "We saw a very bright shooting star."—"Did you really?"
sentences.cn: “我们看到了一颗很明亮的流星。”——“真的吗？”

sentences.en: A bright shooting star, or meteor, is an unforgettable sight.
sentences.cn: 明亮的流星，或者说陨石，是番难忘的景象。

sentences.en: Carter was dubiously convicted of shooting three white men in a bar.
sentences.cn: 卡特被判定在酒吧枪杀3名白人男子，这一罪名似有不妥。

sentences.en: He saw the shooting and memorised the number of the assassin's car.
sentences.cn: 他目睹了枪击过程并记住了刺客的车牌号码。

sentences.en: I go back on the dole when the shooting season's finished.
sentences.cn: 狩猎季节过后，我又重靠领取救济金过活。

sentences.en: People are still hanging out drinking beer, maybe shooting some pool.
sentences.cn: 人们仍聚在那里喝啤酒，可能还会打会儿台球。

sentences.en: She thought the shooting might have been an accident.
sentences.cn: 她想这次枪击可能是一次意外。

sentences.en: Shooting broke out after the guards surrounded a villa in the city.
sentences.cn: 卫兵包围了该市的一所别墅后便发生了枪战。

sentences.en: The shooting occurred in the 34th Precinct.
sentences.cn: 枪击事件发生在第34警区。

sentences.en: The shooting of The Maltese Falcon proceeded without a hitch.
sentences.cn: 《马耳他之鹰》的拍摄进展顺利。

sentences.en: The shooting party set off shortly before dawn.
sentences.cn: 拂晓前不久这群打猎者就出发了。

sentences.en: The shooting-range is lit from underneath by rows of ruby-red light fittings.
sentences.cn: 射击场被一排排深红色的灯光设备从下面照亮了.

sentences.en: the whole shooting match is being computerized.
There have been a whole slew of shooting incidents.
Two more bodies were found nearby after the shooting.
sentences.cn: 枪击事件后附近又发现了两具尸体。

words.tran_cn: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的
射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）
射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射

phrases.tran_cn: 炮点距；摄影距离；射击距离
射流；急流；快速射流急流
标靶射击；目标射击；目标打靶控制

trans.tran_cn: 射击，发出，投篮，摄影，射杀，枪杀
trans.tran_en: the sport of shooting animals and birds with guns
